welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Braunstone, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom. Known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Midlands Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at East Midlands Airport handles a large volume of freight and is a major hub for logistics and distribution.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Connect to the EMA-WiFi network and follow the instructions to access the internet.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Cottesmore RAF Airport is used exclusively for military flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at West Midlands International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at West Midlands International Airport is used for transporting goods and mail.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nottingham Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Birmingham Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The smaller terminal at Birmingham Airport, mainly used for low-cost and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. A premium option is also available for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northampton Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northampton Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
